function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of backup energy sources","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to energy supply disruptions and failure in the event of a pandemic","Mitigation":"Developing access to backup energy sources to ensure resilience during a pandemic","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, backup generators, battery storage systems","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers, local communities","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, local energy authorities"},{"Description":"High energy consumption and inefficiency","Impact":"Contributes to environmental impact, increased costs, and potential strain on energy resources during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Implementing energy-efficient technologies and practices, promoting renewable energy use","Technologies":"Efficient appliances, HVAC systems, lighting systems, renewable energy technologies","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers, sustainability coordinators","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, sustainability coordinators, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Air leakage and infiltration","Impact":"Increases energy losses, compromises indoor air quality, and can contribute to the spread of airborne diseases such as viruses","Mitigation":"Addressing air leakage through building envelope improvements, ventilation system upgrades, and indoor air quality management","Technologies":"Building envelope sealing, ventilat"}]}
